cards.title: Quality
cards.description: We use advanced methods and products for wash and dry-clean to enhance your clothes newness and shine.

cards.title: Affordable
cards.description: At Dry Cleaners Point, we charge a reasonable amount for laundry and dry-cleaning, which is not heavy on your pocket.

cards.title: Care of Clothes
cards.description: We take utmost care of your clothes while dry-cleaning or laundry and take essential precautions.

cards.title: Pick & Drop
cards.description: Hence, we value your time and provide the facility of instant pick up and drop off clothes at your doorstep.

cards.title: On Time Delivery
cards.description: We make sure that you get your clothes right on time if you have to attend an important meeting, party, interview, etc.

cards.title: Environment Friendly
cards.description: We use machines and equipment that are completely environment friendly in terms of less water consumption.
